ObjectClass.Name: Octo
ObjectClass.Description:
OCTO: Biological melee shock trooper Good at absorbing enemy fire Progenerates sepi and pharo units Morphs into R.P or Dome
Upgradable defensive abilities: Adv. Str.: Rapid shield regen. [+60 9/s] Weapons: 3X shield regen. [+180 27/s]

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: \Move to specified location \Move Speed: 3, MaxInc: 45\Vision Range: 18, Aggro Radius: 25 \Invisible in Fog of War

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack target or Attack-Move to location \ \[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs ]\Gnd: 60 , R 1, Sta B\Air: 0

Objective.Name: Patrol
Objective.Details: Hold CTRL and select up to 5 points to\continuously patrol around\Target one of your own units to HOLD\current position or select a single\location to HOLD that position

Objective.Name: Change Commander
Objective.Details: Set an Arcticus as commander or set\target's Arcticus as own commander

Objective.Name: Remove from Heirarchy
Objective.Details: Remove from command hierarchy\ \Disconnect from commander

Objective.Name: Lead group
Objective.Details: \Take lead of everyone that\reports to this unit's Arcticus

Objective.Name: Resource Processor
Objective.Details: - place near resource bins\Small building\processes L-Crystals and Q-Plasma\Converts Q-P into L-C\Can move itself

Objective.Name: Morph: Dome
Objective.Details: Not Available \ Requires the Adv Buildings upgrade

Objective.Name: Morph: Dome
Objective.Details: Robust defensive weapon emplacement\Strong versus air\Breaks TSS\Detects cloaked units\Can move itself

Objective.Name: Factory/Progeneration
Objective.Details: Create base- and -pod-class units\when near another base-class\progenerator; when placed near\- Sepi: progenerate Pharo(-pod) units\- Pharo: progenerate Sepi(-pod) units

Objective.Name: Factory/Progeneration
Objective.Details: Create base- and -pod-class units\when near another base-class\progenerator; when placed near\- Sepi: progenerate Pharo(-pod) units\- Pharo: progenerate Sepi(-pod) units

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: \Chronoport to location in time\ \Must not have a TSS

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Not Available\ Requires the Chronoporting\ upgrade at the REAPH

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: \Teleport to a specified location\ Must be near a Teleporter

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: \Chronoport to location in time\Must not have a TSS
